question: Which of the following represents the cell potential?
option1: sum of the electrode potentials of the cathode and anode
option2: difference between the electrode potentials of the cathode and anode
option3: half of the sum of the electrode potentials of the cathode and anode
option4: twice the difference between the electrode potentials of the cathode and anode
answer: difference between the electrode potentials of the cathode and anode
explanation: The cell potential is the difference between the electrode potentials (reduction potentials) of the cathode and anode. It is measured in volts.
